Package client.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
client.network.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
TcpClient
public abstract class Client extends Object
The abstract base class for a client that sends and receives data over a network.

    • sendAndReceive

      public abstract Response sendAndReceive(Request request)
      Sends a request to the server and waits for a response.
      Parameters:
      request - the request to send to the server
      Returns:
      the response received from the server

    • send

      protected abstract void send(Request request) throws IOException
      Sends a request to the server.
      Parameters:
      request - the request to send to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error sending the request

    • receive

      protected abstract Response receive() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Receives a response from the server.
      Returns:
      the response received from the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error receiving the response
      ClassNotFoundException - if the response object received is of an unknown class

    • close

      public abstract void close()
      Closes the connection to the server.

    • setPort

      public static void setPort(String[] args)
      Sets the port number for the client to use when connecting to the server.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments passed to the client program

    • setHost

      public static void setHost(String[] args)
      Sets the host address for the client to use when connecting to the server.
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments passed to the client program

    • connect

      public abstract void connect() throws IOException
      Connects to the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error connecting to the server

    • isConnected

      public abstract boolean isConnected()
      Checks whether the client is currently connected to the server.
      Returns:
      true if the client is connected, false otherwise
